the HIVE
connect. create. collaborate.
Welcome to
your new
creative space.

Cowork in Downtown Fairbanks!

Located in the historic Lathrop Building downtown, the HIVE is where you can come to get work done. We provide a comfortable office environment suited to all your needs, so you can relax and focus.

The HIVE is operated by Andrew McKnight, a software engineer who moved to Fairbanks in the summer of 2018. Working remotely, he split time between his dry cabin and various cafés before deciding he needed some space of his own to work. Working at companies with offices in Boston and San Francisco has shown him what it takes to create a good space for deep work and getting into your flow.

NEARBY

The ideal central location

Located walking distance from the courthouse, post office, parking garage, Marriott and the beautiful Golden Heart Plaza right on the Chena River. And if you're hungry or thirsty, the options are many:
  • Venue: grab coffee in the building, or take in some new art on First Fridays
  • The Crepery
  • Noodle House
  • River City Café
  • Bahn Thai
  • The Fudge Pot
  • Lavelle's and Lavelle's Taphouse
  • Goldie's
  • Midnight Mine
With other fun attractions nearby, including:
  • Escape Room AK
  • Fairbanks Ice Museum
  • Midnight Sun Festival
  • Yukon Quest building
  • Morris Thompson Cultural Center
